attributes.action:
Legal aid for dad's who want to be In There
Child's life
attributes.background: To many dads are being refused to be in there child's life due to break ups there should be legal aid to help this happen in court due to costs

rejection.details:
Legal aid is already available for family issues, including for family mediation and disputes involving children. For more information about this, please follow the link below:

https://childlawadvice.org.uk/information-pages/legal-aid-for-family-law-matters/
